appetizers.name: Deep Fried Mushrooms
appetizers.description: Whole white mushrooms breaded and deepfried to a golden brown, crunchy goodness!

appetizers.name: Mozz Sticks with Marinara Sauce
appetizers.description: Deep fried mozzerella surrounded by golden brown, cruchy crust with fresh, handmade marinara sauce!

cold sandwiches.name: Mother's Ham and Cheese Sandwhich
cold sandwiches.description: The ham and cheese sandwhich that will take you right back to mom's kitchen table. Hand made sour-dough bread with red-wood smoked ham and pepper-jack chees piled high with all the fixings!

cold sandwiches.name: Peanut Butter Jelly Time PB&J
ingredients: organic strawberry, rasberry, or grape jelly
cold sandwiches.description: The perfect PB&J. Best enjoyed with one of our big glasses of milk!

hot sandwhiches.name: Grilled Turkey & Cheese Sliders
hot sandwhiches.description: Four grilled turkey & cheese sliders that promise a new spin on an old favorite

hot sandwhiches.name: The Father of All Ruebens
hot sandwhiches.description: Over a 1/4 pound of sliced corned beef piled high with sauerkraut, aged swiss cheese and home made thousand island dressing. All of this goodness slammed between two perfectly toasted peices of fresh baked rye bread!

desserts.name: Authentic New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: New York Cheesecake that is flown in from New York every week. Known for it's creamy, satiny texture. One piece is all you'll need but you will keep coming back for more!

desserts.name: Crème brûlée
desserts.description: A baked to perfection Crème brûlée that will make the perfect crack when you break through the top layer of camelized sugar to get to the oowy goowy center!

drinks.name: Italian Cream Soda
drinks.description: Old fashioned Italian Cream Soda served with a mountain of whipped cream and cherry on top!

drinks.name: Bottled Topo Chico Sparkling Mineral Water
drinks.description: The favorite water from our friends from the South, Texas!
